game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, you are tasked with rekindling the eternal flame that once brought balance to the universe. Your quest begins in the land of Tenaria, where the fabric of time has been torn apart by an ancient evil.
game.beginning: You find yourself standing at the edge of a desolate wasteland, surrounded by the ruins of a once-great civilization. A cryptic message from a mysterious stranger sets you on your journey to uncover the truth about Tenaria's downfall and restore the eternal flame.
game.ending: After braving treacherous landscapes, forging alliances with enigmatic companions, and unraveling ancient mysteries, you finally reach the heart of the realm where the eternal flame burns brightest. With a final act of determination, you rekindle the flame, mending the fabric of time and restoring balance to the universe.
